mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(userid, mno, pwd, name, nickname, email, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, auth, confirm, act, dropout) VALUES (#{userid}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(mno), 0)+1 as mno FROM member), #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate, #{auth}, #{confirm}, #{act}, #{dropout})
mapper.select: SELECT mno, userid, pwd, name, nickname, email, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, auth, confirm, act, dropout FROM member ORDER BY mno ASC
SELECT userid, mno, pwd, name, nickname, email, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, auth, confirm, act, dropout FROM member WHERE mno=#{mno}
SELECT userid, mno, pwd, name, nickname, email, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, auth, confirm, act, dropout FROM member WHERE userid=#{userid}
